sentence.Network_en: The earliest disorder is emphysema after phosgene or diphosgene inhalation.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study clinical manifestation and remedy of acute phosgene poisoning.

sentence.Network_en: Phosgene poisoning can cause pulmonary edema and even ARDS.
sentence.Network_cn: 光气中毒可引起迟发性肺水肿甚至急性呼吸窘迫综合征(ARDS).

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Greek phōs 'light' + -gen, with reference to its original production by the action of sunlight on chlorine and carbon monoxide
